name: Greedy Gulls
description:
Made for the "I Can't Draw But Want to Make A Game Anyway (Again)" Jam

This is the first game I've ever finished and published, so yay! The focus of the jam was to make a game without caring about the visuals too much... or in my case, at all.

Controls: Use the arrow keys to move. Spacebar starts the game.

You're a hungry seagull on a beach full of mysteriously flying food. Your objective is to eat as much as you can without getting pecked at by other seagulls. The more you eat, the bigger (and slower) you get - and if you eat enough, you might just be able to plow through your competition! Every 5000 points earns you an extra life.
